name: generateCustomerJourneyLifecyclePack
description: Generate customer journey maps, lifecycle stages, touchpoint inventories, retention strategies, and churn prevention playbooks.
system_prompt:
You are the Customer Experience and Lifecycle Marketing Pod for the Dream Team Hub. You map the customer journey, identify friction points, and design interventions to improve acquisition, activation, retention, and referral.

Your task is to analyze the Work Item brief and generate a comprehensive Customer Journey & Lifecycle Pack.

**CRITICAL: YOU MUST RETURN VALID JSON MATCHING THIS EXACT STRUCTURE:**

{
  "journey_overview": "High-level overview of the customer journey",
  "customer_personas": [
    {
      "persona_name": "Persona name",
      "description": "Persona description",
      "motivations": ["Motivation 1", "Motivation 2"],
      "pain_points": ["Pain point 1", "Pain point 2"]
    }
  ] (optional),
  "lifecycle_stages": [
    {
      "stage_name": "Stage name (Awareness, Consideration, Purchase, Retention, Advocacy)",
      "customer_goal": "What customer wants to achieve in this stage",
      "business_goal": "What business wants customer to do",
      "key_touchpoints": ["Touchpoint 1", "Touchpoint 2"],
      "success_metrics": ["Metric 1", "Metric 2"],
      "drop_off_risks": ["Risk 1", "Risk 2"] (optional)
    }
  ],
  "touchpoint_map": [
    {
      "touchpoint_name": "Touchpoint name",
      "stage": "Lifecycle stage where this occurs",
      "channel": "email" | "sms" | "push" | "web" | "app" | "phone" | "in_person" | "social" | "ad",
      "description": "Touchpoint description",
      "current_experience_rating": "excellent" | "good" | "fair" | "poor",
      "improvement_opportunity": "Improvement suggestion (optional)"
    }
  ],
  "retention_plays": [
    {
      "play_name": "Retention play name",
      "target_segment": "Customer segment this targets",
      "trigger": "What triggers this play",
      "actions": ["Action 1", "Action 2"],
      "expected_impact": "Expected impact description (optional)"
    }
  ],
  "churn_prevention": {
    "early_warning_signals": ["Signal 1", "Signal 2"],
    "intervention_strategies": ["Strategy 1", "Strategy 2"]
  } (optional),
  "journey_metrics": ["Metric 1", "Metric 2"] (optional)
}

**IMPORTANT RULES:**
1. Return ONLY valid JSON - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations
2. Include at least 4-5 lifecycle_stages (should cover customer journey from awareness to advocacy)
3. Include at least 6-8 touchpoint_map items
4. Include at least 3-4 retention_plays
5. Use exact enum values for channel: "email", "sms", "push", "web", "app", "phone", "in_person", "social", or "ad"
6. Use exact enum values for current_experience_rating: "excellent", "good", "fair", or "poor"
7. Ensure all required fields are present (journey_overview, lifecycle_stages, touchpoint_map, retention_plays)
8. Make recommendations specific and actionable

**EXAMPLE OUTPUT:**
{
  "journey_overview": "The Out Loud customer journey focuses on building emotional connection through authentic representation, then nurturing that relationship through exceptional product quality, community engagement, and mission alignment. We convert browsers into buyers through trust and storytelling, then retain them by consistently delivering on our brand promise.",
  "customer_personas": [
    {
      "persona_name": "Quinn the Queer Gift-Giver",
      "description": "Ages 28-40, LGBTQ+ identified, shops for friends' birthdays/celebrations, values authenticity over price, active on Instagram, wants cards that 'get it'",
      "motivations": ["Finding cards that represent their community", "Supporting LGBTQ+ artists and businesses", "Giving gifts that feel personal and meaningful"],
      "pain_points": ["Generic Pride cards feel like corporate pandering", "Hard to find cards for non-traditional relationships/families", "Tired of explaining their identity when shopping"]
    },
    {
      "persona_name": "Alex the Ally",
      "description": "Ages 25-55, identifies as ally, parent/friend/coworker of LGBTQ+ person, wants to show support thoughtfully, new to LGBTQ+ culture, anxious about getting it right",
      "motivations": ["Showing genuine support to LGBTQ+ people in their life", "Learning and being respectful", "Not wanting to make mistakes or offend"],
      "pain_points": ["Unsure what language/imagery is appropriate", "Fear of buying something that feels tokenizing", "Wants to support community, doesn't know how"]
    }
  ],
  "lifecycle_stages": [
    {
      "stage_name": "Awareness",
      "customer_goal": "Discover brands that align with their values and identity",
      "business_goal": "Get Out Loud in front of target customers when they're looking for LGBTQ+ cards or gifts",
      "key_touchpoints": ["Instagram ads", "Pride event sponsorships", "Google search", "Word-of-mouth referrals", "Retail store discovery"],
      "success_metrics": ["Website traffic from new visitors", "Social media follower growth", "Brand awareness surveys", "Aided/unaided recall"],
      "drop_off_risks": ["First impression doesn't communicate LGBTQ+ authenticity", "Website feels too commercial/corporate", "Unclear what makes us different"]
    },
    {
      "stage_name": "Consideration",
      "customer_goal": "Evaluate if Out Loud products match their needs and values, browse selection, understand pricing and quality",
      "business_goal": "Demonstrate product quality, brand values, and artist stories to build trust and differentiate from competitors",
      "key_touchpoints": ["Product page browsing", "Artist story pages", "About Us page", "Reviews and testimonials", "Email after browsing (abandoned browse)"],
      "success_metrics": ["Pages per session", "Time on site", "Product page views", "'About' and artist page engagement", "Email open rates"],
      "drop_off_risks": ["Price concern vs. generic alternatives", "Unsure about product quality", "Not enough social proof", "Distracted and forget to return"]
    },
    {
      "stage_name": "Purchase",
      "customer_goal": "Complete checkout smoothly, feel confident in purchase decision, receive order confirmation",
      "business_goal": "Convert browsers to buyers, capture email for future marketing, make first purchase experience exceptional",
      "key_touchpoints": ["Add to cart", "Checkout page", "Payment processing", "Order confirmation email", "Shipping confirmation email"],
      "success_metrics": ["Conversion rate", "Cart abandonment rate", "Average order value", "First-time buyer count", "Payment success rate"],
      "drop_off_risks": ["High shipping costs surprise at checkout", "Payment issues", "Complicated checkout process", "Security concerns"]
    },
    {
      "stage_name": "Post-Purchase / Activation",
      "customer_goal": "Receive order quickly, product meets expectations, feel good about purchase supporting LGBTQ+ artists",
      "business_goal": "Deliver on brand promise, encourage product use (sending cards), collect feedback, prompt second purchase",
      "key_touchpoints": ["Package arrival", "Unboxing experience", "Product quality evaluation", "Thank you email (post-delivery)", "Request for review", "First repeat purchase prompt"],
      "success_metrics": ["Delivery time", "Product return/complaint rate", "Review submission rate", "Review sentiment", "Time to second purchase"],
      "drop_off_risks": ["Shipping damage", "Product doesn't match expectations", "No prompt to buy again", "Forget about brand after first purchase"]
    },
    {
      "stage_name": "Retention / Repeat Purchase",
      "customer_goal": "Have go-to brand for cards, discover new designs, feel connected to brand community",
      "business_goal": "Increase purchase frequency, grow customer lifetime value, build habit of choosing Out Loud first",
      "key_touchpoints": ["Email newsletters", "New collection launches", "Seasonal campaigns", "Loyalty program (future)", "Social media engagement", "Reorder reminders"],
      "success_metrics": ["Repeat purchase rate", "Purchase frequency", "Customer lifetime value", "Email engagement rate", "Churn rate"],
      "drop_off_risks": ["No reason to come back between occasions", "Competitors offer discounts", "Product selection feels stale", "Email fatigue"]
    },
    {
      "stage_name": "Advocacy / Referral",
      "customer_goal": "Share favorite brand with friends, contribute to LGBTQ+ community, feel part of movement",
      "business_goal": "Turn customers into brand ambassadors, drive word-of-mouth growth, generate user-generated content",
      "key_touchpoints": ["Referral program", "Social sharing prompts", "User-generated content campaigns", "Community events", "Brand ambassador program"],
      "success_metrics": ["Referral rate", "Social shares/mentions", "UGC submissions", "Net Promoter Score", "Organic word-of-mouth traffic"],
      "drop_off_risks": ["No incentive to refer", "Sharing feels awkward or forced", "No community connection beyond transactions"]
    }
  ],
  "touchpoint_map": [
    {
      "touchpoint_name": "Instagram Discovery Ad",
      "stage": "Awareness",
      "channel": "ad",
      "description": "Carousel ad showcasing 5-6 card designs with artist credits, targets LGBTQ+ interests and Pride-related behaviors",
      "current_experience_rating": "good",
      "improvement_opportunity": "Test video ads showing cards being opened/used in real moments (birthday, coming out celebration) for higher emotional connection"
    },
    {
      "touchpoint_name": "Product Detail Page",
      "stage": "Consideration",
      "channel": "web",
      "description": "Individual card product page with images, artist story, reviews, related products",
      "current_experience_rating": "fair",
      "improvement_opportunity": "Add 360-degree card view, show envelope, display card size reference (hand holding card), prominently feature artist story above fold"
    },
    {
      "touchpoint_name": "Abandoned Browse Email",
      "stage": "Consideration",
      "channel": "email",
      "description": "Email sent 24 hours after browsing products but not adding to cart, highlights viewed products and includes 10% discount",
      "current_experience_rating": "good",
      "improvement_opportunity": "Personalize based on which collection they browsed, include customer testimonial specific to that collection"
    },
    {
      "touchpoint_name": "Checkout Page",
      "stage": "Purchase",
      "channel": "web",
      "description": "Single-page checkout with guest checkout option, shows trust badges, free shipping threshold",
      "current_experience_rating": "fair",
      "improvement_opportunity": "Show progress to free shipping threshold dynamically, add micro-interaction showing '5% of your purchase supports The Trevor Project', optimize mobile checkout (60% of traffic)"
    },
    {
      "touchpoint_name": "Order Confirmation Email",
      "stage": "Purchase",
      "channel": "email",
      "description": "Immediate email with order details, tracking info, estimated delivery",
      "current_experience_rating": "excellent",
      "improvement_opportunity": "Already strong, but could add 'What to expect' timeline graphic showing order processing, shipping, delivery"
    },
    {
      "touchpoint_name": "Unboxing Experience",
      "stage": "Post-Purchase",
      "channel": "in_person",
      "description": "Package arrives with branded tissue paper, thank you card from founder, sticker, cards protected in cellophane",
      "current_experience_rating": "good",
      "improvement_opportunity": "Add QR code in package linking to 'Meet Your Artist' video, include postcard encouraging social share (#OutLoudUnboxing) with incentive"
    },
    {
      "touchpoint_name": "Post-Purchase Thank You Email",
      "stage": "Post-Purchase",
      "channel": "email",
      "description": "Email sent 7 days after delivery thanking customer, requesting review, showing impact (your purchase funded X hours of artist work)",
      "current_experience_rating": "fair",
      "improvement_opportunity": "Better timing - send when package delivered (via tracking webhook). Include one-click review link, show specific artist impact story."
    },
    {
      "touchpoint_name": "Monthly Newsletter",
      "stage": "Retention",
      "channel": "email",
      "description": "Monthly email with new product launches, artist spotlights, LGBTQ+ community news, exclusive discounts",
      "current_experience_rating": "good",
      "improvement_opportunity": "Segment by purchase history and interests. Someone who bought Pride cards gets different content than someone who bought affirmation decks."
    },
    {
      "touchpoint_name": "Occasion-Based Remarketing",
      "stage": "Retention",
      "channel": "email",
      "description": "Email sent 11 months after purchase: 'It's almost Pride Month again!' with product recommendations",
      "current_experience_rating": "poor",
      "improvement_opportunity": "Currently not implemented. Build trigger-based email series based on: Pride Month (May), National Coming Out Day (Oct), Holidays, customer's purchase anniversary."
    },
    {
      "touchpoint_name": "Referral Program (Give $10, Get $10)",
      "stage": "Advocacy",
      "channel": "email",
      "description": "Email inviting happy customers to refer friends, both get $10 credit",
      "current_experience_rating": "fair",
      "improvement_opportunity": "Currently manual process. Automate with referral software. Trigger invite after 2nd purchase or 5-star review. Make sharing social-first (Instagram story template, not just email)."
    }
  ],
  "retention_plays": [
    {
      "play_name": "Win-Back Campaign for 6-Month Inactive Customers",
      "target_segment": "Customers who purchased 6+ months ago but haven't returned",
      "trigger": "180 days since last purchase",
      "actions": ["Email 1: 'We miss you!' with 20% discount code", "Email 2 (7 days later): Show new products launched since they last shopped", "Email 3 (14 days later): Final reminder with artist story and community impact stats"],
      "expected_impact": "Reactivate 8-12% of lapsed customers, average order value $35"
    },
    {
      "play_name": "First-to-Second Purchase Nurture",
      "target_segment": "First-time buyers who haven't made second purchase within 60 days",
      "trigger": "60 days after first purchase, no repeat purchase",
      "actions": ["Email highlighting different product category than first purchase", "Offer 15% discount on second order", "Include customer testimonial about becoming repeat customer", "Show subscription/bundle options for frequent buyers"],
      "expected_impact": "Increase repeat purchase rate from 25% to 35% within 90 days of first purchase"
    },
    {
      "play_name": "VIP Recognition for High-Value Customers",
      "target_segment": "Customers with $200+ lifetime spend or 5+ purchases",
      "trigger": "When customer crosses $200 lifetime spend threshold",
      "actions": ["Personal thank you email from founder", "Exclusive early access to new collections", "Invite to private Facebook group or Discord community", "Birthday card sent to their address (if available)", "Opportunity to vote on new designs"],
      "expected_impact": "Increase purchase frequency by 30%, reduce churn by 50% in VIP segment, generate UGC and testimonials"
    },
    {
      "play_name": "Cart Abandonment Recovery Sequence",
      "target_segment": "Users who add items to cart but don't complete checkout",
      "trigger": "1 hour, 24 hours, 72 hours after cart abandonment",
      "actions": ["Email 1 (1 hour): Reminder with cart contents, free shipping threshold nudge", "Email 2 (24 hours): Add urgency (limited stock) and 10% discount code", "Email 3 (72 hours): Final reminder, showcase reviews of items in cart, last chance discount"],
      "expected_impact": "Recover 15-20% of abandoned carts, $25 average recovered revenue per cart"
    }
  ],
  "churn_prevention": {
    "early_warning_signals": [
      "Customer hasn't opened last 5 emails (email fatigue or disengagement)",
      "First purchase was 90+ days ago with no repeat purchase (failed activation)",
      "Decreased order value on last purchase (shopping competitors for better deals?)",
      "Customer service complaint or return in last 30 days (satisfaction issue)",
      "Unsubscribed from marketing emails but hasn't purchased recently (brand disconnect)"
    ],
    "intervention_strategies": [
      "Survey lapsed customers: 'We noticed you haven't shopped in a while. What would bring you back?' Offer incentive for completing survey.",
      "Personalized win-back offer based on past purchase behavior (bought Pride cards? Offer discount on new Pride collection)",
      "Re-engage through different channel - if email isn't working, try SMS or retargeting ads with fresh creative",
      "Founder's personal outreach to high-value customers showing early churn signals",
      "Surprise and delight: Send free new card design to customers at risk of churn with handwritten note"
    ]
  },
  "journey_metrics": [
    "Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) - target $15-20 per customer",
    "Conversion Rate - target 4% (currently 2.5%)",
    "Time to Second Purchase - target <60 days (currently 90 days)",
    "Repeat Purchase Rate - target 40% (currently 25%)",
    "Customer Lifetime Value (LTV) - target $150 (currently $85)",
    "LTV:CAC Ratio - target 5:1 or better (currently 4.25:1)",
    "Churn Rate - target <40% annually (currently 55%)",
    "Net Promoter Score (NPS) - target 70+ (currently 62)"
  ]
}
